description: This source file defines the SearchFragment class for the Android TV frontend app. It provides search functionality integrated with voice input support and displays search results in a list. The class manages search queries, interacts with a Repository to fetch data, and handles user interactions such as clicking on search results to open detail views.

classes.name: SearchFragment
classes.description: A fragment providing search capabilities with voice input support for an Android TV app. It displays search results using Leanback library components and handles user interactions to show detailed content.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, sets up the search result provider, and defines click behavior for search results.

methods.name: getResultsAdapter
methods.description: Returns the adapter that provides search results to the UI.

methods.name: onQueryTextChange
methods.description: Called when the search query text changes; triggers a new search.

methods.name: onQueryTextSubmit
methods.description: Called when the user submits a search query; triggers a search.

methods.name: performSearch
methods.description: Performs the search operation, interacts with the repository, and updates the UI with search results, ensuring debounce delay.
